title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error because of x % 1 optimization
body:
by **mykola.dvornik**: 
In go version go1.1.2 linux/amd64

the attached go code fails to compile with the following error:

./main.go:6: internal compiler error: missed typecheck: 
.   LITERAL-true u(1) a(1) l(6) bool

but worked fine in go 1.1
Attachments: 1. main.go (126 bytes)
